entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 10:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: SSW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5 except zero along parts of the coast.
